title: WhatsApp for Mac also set to receive upcoming iMessage-like Reactions feature
content:
WhatsApp has been working for a while to introduce a new iMessage-like Reactions feature to all users. While it’s still not available for beta testers to try it out, the company seems to be planning a simultaneous rollout of the function, as the app is now readying Reactions for its Mac version as well.

more…

The post WhatsApp for Mac also set to receive upcoming iMessage-like Reactions feature appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: WhatsApp has been working for a while to introduce a new iMessage-like Reactions feature to all users, now to its Mac app as well.
